headline: Eli Lilly and Company (LLY) Releases Updated Results from Phase 3 EMBER-3 Study of Inluriyo (imlunestrant)
summary: Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE:LLY) is one of the Best Stocks to Invest in for the Next 3 Years. On December 12, Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE:LLY) released updated results from Phase 3 EMBER-3 study of Inluriyo (imlunestrant), which is an oral estrogen receptor antagonist, in patients with estrogen receptor positive (ER+), human epidermal growth factor […]
